channel.title: Pages on Abhay PS
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Abhay PS

item.title: Who is Abhay PS?
item.description: Hi, I am Abhay Pratap Singh. I find my name quite long so I prefer writing it as “Abhay PS”. I first started programming in the C language back in 1997, and since then my passion for programming has been increasing each day. Now I can write softwares in many programming languages like Python, Ruby, PHP, Javascript and Rust, but try to constrain myself to using Python only. In my early days, I was a full stack web developer for more than a decade and created web applications for a wide variety of clients.
